summary: Item 2. Management’s Discussion and Analysis of Financial Condition and Results of Operations Financial Summary Third quarter 2025 included the following notable items: • GAAP diluted earnings per share were $1.51 and Adjusted EPS 1 were $1.78. • Net Sales were $25.3 billion, a decrease of 1.5 percent from the comparable prior-year period. • Comparable sales decreased 2.7 percent, reflecting a 2.2 percent decrease in traffic and a 0.5 percent decrease in average transaction amount. ◦ Comparable stores-originated sales declined 3.8 percent.
